summary: Sets the player on a challenging treasure hunt
descriptionHtml:
There are tips and tricks to find all chests in the following video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kFE0g8KSYWU&feature=g-upl&context=G21fe141AUAAAAAAAAAA

There are 3 chest spread around Skyrim

One in Whiterun

Hint: Beautiful Streams

One In Solidute

Hint: What Nice Flowers

One In Riften

Hint: In The Hand Of The Betrayer



If you enjoy this mod, show your love, endorse it, when i get 10 endorsements i will make a version 2.0
author: herro
